thread.title: A great location at Central Park
thread.title_full: A great location at Central Park - Review of Trump International Hotel and Tower New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: W4499DUjohnc
title: A great location at Central Park
text: Friendly Staff and very accommodating The lobby is small so never crowded for long The elevators are quick and so the transition from street to room is minimal As you pass through the lobby because of it size all the staff welcome you back making you feel that your home The rooms are large and comfortable for NY and very well maintained with full equipped kitchens in most, which is handy if your staying for more than a few nights A home from home in the Big Apple
